scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/index.js --external:sqlite3 --external:serialport --external:node-hid --external:@fastify/static --format=cjs && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function copyDir(src,dest){if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});const entries=fs.readdirSync(src,{withFileTypes:true});for(let entry of entries){const srcPath=path.join(src,entry.name);const destPath=path.join(dest,entry.name);if(entry.isDirectory()){copyDir(srcPath,destPath);}else{fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath);}}}copyDir('src/ui','dist/ui');"
